title: Can you fix the Nebula project?

start.title: Welcome to the game: can you fix that project?
start.description: Here is the project, do you think you can fix that project?

lets_start.title: Here is the project Nebula!
lets_start.description: The project is a mess and everything is late and urgent! People are working over hours and etc.

questions.title: I want to meet the team.
I want to meet the manager(s).

meeting_team.title: Meeting the team
meeting_team.description: During the team meeting you see that the team is almost burnt out. There is something in the air that is strange.

questions.title: John looks particular annoied with my presence. I try to talk with him
Mary is always trying to say something. She keep saying that the team does not know what to do next.
